ActDepartment of Human Resources Development Act
Special Appointment Regulations, No. 2004-22
PrecisAppointment of ALAN NYMARK of Ottawa, Ontario, to be Deputy Minister of Human Resources and Skills Development, to hold office during pleasure; to be concurrently an Associate Deputy Minister of Human Resources Development, to hold office during pleasure; and as a commissioner of the Canada Employment Insurance Commission, to be the Vice-Chairperson of the Commission; effective December 20, 2004.
AttachmentsAttachment
